title:
On a continued fraction algorithm in finite extensions of $\Q_p$ and its
  metrical theory
authors: Manoj Choudhuri and Prashant J. Makadiya
abstract:
We develop a continued fraction algorithm in finite extensions of $\Q_p$
generalising certain algorithms in $\Q_p$, and prove the finiteness property
for certain small degree extensions. We also discuss the metrical properties of
the associated continued fraction maps for our algorithms using subsequence
ergodic theory and moving averages.
